content.question: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Refer to the figure or diagram to answer the question. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples. An aquatic food web includes the following organisms. (a) Refer to the food web above to identify the following organisms. (i) Identify a primary producer.

frqParts.text: Write your answers in the spaces provided. Refer to the figure or diagram to answer the question. Where explanation or discussion is required, support your answers with relevant information and/or specific examples. An aquatic food web includes the following organisms. (a) Refer to the food web above to identify the following organisms. (i) Identify a primary producer.
(iii) Identify two organisms that compete for the same food source.
(b) Describe the process of primary productivity.
(c) Describe one short-term, direct effect that overharvesting crabs would have on the food web shown above.
(d) Besides banning all harvest of crabs, describe one potential realistic strategy to increase the population of crabs.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
